root.name: Space Dungeon
root.description: Space Dungeon was ported to the Atari 5200 and later appeared on the PSP as part of the Taito Legends: Power Up compilation. The home port for the 5200 requires two Atari controllers for the one player game. (One to move, one to shoot) because of this the game shipped with a special holder that players used to easily hold both controllers at once,
